message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you.  I'm asking for $20,000, which reflects its true worth.
I appreciate your enthusiasm, Alice, but I'm not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for the product. I think that's a fair price considering its worth to me.

Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the value. How about we meet in the middle at $17,000? I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations and be well worth the investment.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $14,000 for the product. I think that's a fair price considering its worth to me.
